hero.title: Our Mission: Precision. Speed. Trust.
hero.subtitle: We're revolutionizing construction through precision engineering and innovative modular solutions.

about.paragraph: Fast Struct began with a simple idea - to remove the friction from building your dream home. Traditional construction is slow, unpredictable, and overwhelming. We created a smarter way - one that puts speed, quality, and clarity first.

imageText.paragraph: By combining modular and panelized construction, we bring together speed, flexibility, and quality. As a licensed contractor with a state-approved manufacturing facility, we provide complete A-Z solutions. Every client gets a dedicated project manager, and our team handles everything from permits to final delivery.

members.name: Sarah Johnson
members.bio: With over 15 years in construction and modular building, Sarah leads Fast Struct with a vision to revolutionize home building.

members.name: Michael Chen
members.bio: Michael brings innovative engineering solutions to every project, ensuring quality and efficiency in our modular systems.
